text:
```Canton - Attestor Mainnet Launch Schedule

We have finalized the schedule for the Canton - Attestor Mainnet launch. The final deadline to complete all steps is 31st of August. These steps include completing all four steps of Canton onboarding and integrating it with Attestor.

We have already opened participation and sent out some messages by completing Step 0 and Step 1. Now, there is a deadline for these steps as well. Please complete them before Wednesday, 20th of August, 12:00 CET.

If you decide to participate in this round, we kindly ask that you remain responsive over the following two weeks so we can roll out the Canton feature in time for the main deadline.

What happens if you can't or don't want to participate? We can onboard you later. Since we are among the first to onboard a decentralized party on Canton, we need to investigate how to add new members safely. Once we have a secure method, we will onboard more participants.

---

Step 0 creates parties and corresponding users. Please provide us with the PARTY_NAME and USER_NAME you added to run the script.

You can find the details here: <https://github.com/DLC-link/canton-onboarding-mainnet/tree/step0/step0>

---

Step 1 uploads the DAML scripts and creates signing keys you can use to participate in the threshold signature. Please provide the output files to us (you can send them here on Telegram, or we can agree on another way).

You can find the details here: <https://github.com/DLC-link/canton-onboarding-mainnet/tree/step1/step1>

---

If you need any help, please reach out to us — we are happy to help with any step. Thank you for your support so far.```
<@U05FU0HPZ9T> <@U088UV6MKFE> What do you think?

elements.text:
Canton - Attestor Mainnet Launch Schedule

We have finalized the schedule for the Canton - Attestor Mainnet launch. The final deadline to complete all steps is 31st of August. These steps include completing all four steps of Canton onboarding and integrating it with Attestor.

We have already opened participation and sent out some messages by completing Step 0 and Step 1. Now, there is a deadline for these steps as well. Please complete them before Wednesday, 20th of August, 12:00 CET.

If you decide to participate in this round, we kindly ask that you remain responsive over the following two weeks so we can roll out the Canton feature in time for the main deadline.

What happens if you can't or don't want to participate? We can onboard you later. Since we are among the first to onboard a decentralized party on Canton, we need to investigate how to add new members safely. Once we have a secure method, we will onboard more participants.

---

Step 0 creates parties and corresponding users. Please provide us with the PARTY_NAME and USER_NAME you added to run the script.

You can find the details here:

---

Step 1 uploads the DAML scripts and creates signing keys you can use to participate in the threshold signature. Please provide the output files to us (you can send them here on Telegram, or we can agree on another way).

You can find the details here:

---

If you need any help, please reach out to us — we are happy to help with any step. Thank you for your support so far.
What do you think?

text:
So, the GrantRights script is independent of the attestor keycloak client setup.

1. GrantRights needs a participantAdmin token. Same token that was needed for Step 0, when we created the User and Party. 
2. Attestor Keycloak client is needed for the rust code's configuration.

elements.text: So, the GrantRights script is independent of the attestor keycloak client setup.
GrantRights needs a participantAdmin token. Same token that was needed for Step 0, when we created the User and Party.
Attestor Keycloak client is needed for the rust code's configuration.

text: <@U08Q9VCAM1A> has joined the channel

Happy Monday team. I am trying to top up our proof credits in the Canton Utility and have some weird issues with it. Not sure if this is the right channel to ask, but hoping maybe one of you has a fix. The proof top-up should be under Credentials - Billing. I tried all day Friday and it was not loading. It was buffering for a few minutes and then sending me back to the welcome screen. Now I don't even see the billing tab in the credential section, not it shows me only the onboarding tab (2 other tabs are gone too) :woman-shrugging:

elements.text: Happy Monday team. I am trying to top up our proof credits in the Canton Utility and have some weird issues with it. Not sure if this is the right channel to ask, but hoping maybe one of you has a fix. The proof top-up should be under Credentials - Billing. I tried all day Friday and it was not loading. It was buffering for a few minutes and then sending me back to the welcome screen. Now I don't even see the billing tab in the credential section, not it shows me only the onboarding tab (2 other tabs are gone too)
